item.title: Setting up knative
item.description: Let's walk through how to setup a k8 cluster on digitalocean with knative. Digital Ocean Start the cluster Installing and configure the doctl tool. Then setup a cluster: doctl kubernetes cluster create gratitude \ --auto-upgrade \ "--node-pool=name=default;min-nodes=1;max-nodes=10;size=s-4vcpu-8gb;auto-scale=true" Once that's in place, make sure that you have a domain, in my case gitgratitude.com: doctl compute domain create gitgratitude.com Installing knative We are going to use the knative operator to setup the install.
